name: Belt Reflex
description:
In this game you are a factory worker who works in a "sorting factory".

Your job is simple: SORT ITEMS

You have two cardbard boxes (one on the left the other in the center, both on the bottom). There is a text on the box that says what you need to put in it.

There are JUNK ITEMS in the game which you will need to throw into the bin (the cage looking thing).

If an item isn't required in the boxes and it is not a junk item that means that it is a NEUTRAL ITEM you need to burn it in the melter.

To use any of the equipment you can drag the items to them or click on the item and then click on the equipment.

You can also use the melter by not touching the item, on the end of the belt it will burn.

Have fun! Enjoy the game!

-Dom's Games-
